https://api.github.com/repos/vapor/vapor.readme:
![Vapor](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1342803/75634175-4876d680-5bd9-11ea-90d6-12c7b6a9ee3f.png)


Vapor is an HTTP web framework for Swift. It provides a beautifully expressive and easy-to-use foundation for your next website, API, or cloud project. Take a look at some of the [awesome stuff](https://github.com/vapor-community/awesome-vapor) created with Vapor. ### 💧 Community Join the welcoming community of fellow Vapor developers on [Discord](https://vapor.team). ### 🚀 Contributing To contribute a **feature or idea** to Vapor, [create an issue](https://github.com/vapor/vapor/issues/new) explaining your idea or bring it up on [Discord](https://vapor.team). If you find a **bug**, please [create an issue](https://github.com/vapor/vapor/issues/new). If you find a **security vulnerability**, please contact [security@vapor.codes](mailto:security@vapor.codes) as soon as possible. ### 💛 Sponsors Support Vapor's development by [becoming a sponsor](https://github.com/sponsors/vapor). ### 💚 Backers Support Vapor's development by [becoming a backer](https://github.com/sponsors/vapor).

releases.name: 4.111.1 - do not truncate response when streaming on error
4.110.2 - In withApp(), always shut down app even if error is thrown
4.106.6 - Pass the method, url, and user agent from the ErrorMiddleware to the logger in the metadata.
4.106.4 - Use application's logger in InMemory tester
4.106.3 - Adds JPEG XL (JXL) and AVIF HTTPMediaTypes
4.106.1 - Omit ACAO header instead of empty value
4.105.2 - Raise error when the data expected an array but not parsed as array
4.105.1 - Throw an error if unkeyed container is at end
4.103.1 - fix: support capital letters in the domain part of email validation
4.102.0 - Add Sendable conformance to XCTApplicationTester, XCTHTTPRequest/Response, and some others
4.101.4 - Fixed an issue where response compression would fail when returning 304 Not Modified
4.101.3 - Fix decoding 'flag' URL query params via `.decode(StructType.self)`
4.101.2 - Adds TIFF and WebP HTTP Media Types
4.101.1 - Exclude Query and Fragment from URI semicolon fix on Linux
4.100.2 - asyncBoot will no longer try booting server again if it is already booted
4.98.0 - Mark all functions that use `wait` as `noasync`
4.97.1 - Log source file and line info for errors in ErrorMiddleware when possible
4.96.0 - Make # of connections accepted per event loop cycle configurable, and raise the default
4.95.0 - Add support for asynchronous body stream writing
4.94.1 - Patch configuration and log actual port on startup
4.93.2 - Removed streamFile deprecation + deactivated advancedETagComparison by default
4.92.7 - Don't set ignore status for SIGTERM and SIGINT on Linux
4.92.4 - Allow `HTTPServer`'s configuration to be dynamically updatable
4.92.3 - Fix issue when client disconnects midway through a stream
4.92.2 - Fix handling of "flag" URL query params
4.92.1 - Fix URI handling with multiple slashes and variable components.
4.89.3 - Fix setting public folder for `FileMiddleware` when using bundles
4.89.2 - Consistently use the value from `X-Request-Id` as the request's ID when present
4.89.1 - Fix encoding and decoding of HTTPHeaders
4.86.2 - Make Async Request Body actually work
4.86.1 - Create a thread pool of System.coreCount rather than 64 when initializing an Application
4.84.6 - Handle query parameters in FileMiddleware redirects
4.84.2 - [SECURITY] Incorrect request error handling triggers server crash
4.83.2 - HTTPServerErrorHandler: Improve Error Handling for HTTPParserError
4.83.0 - Support Crypto 3.0.0 in the other package manifest
4.81.1 - `Logger.report()` should handle `LocalizedError`, `DecodingError`, and `EncodingError` identically to other errors
4.81.0 - The swift-backtrace library is no longer needed in 5.9
4.79.0 - Add Sendable Conformances to underlying types
4.78.1 - Fix for #2574 Missing quote from value
4.78.0 - Allow specifying a timeout for client requests
4.77.2 - Update dependencies with known CVEs to the latest versions
Fixed drain handler call order in case of asynchronous buffer handling
Fix `Range: bytes=0-0` header not working properly
Fix crash when collecting the body
Correctly handle invalid numbers in range validations
Revert "Add support for asynchronous body stream writing"
Add support for asynchronous body stream writing
Add support for Cache-Control header 'immutable' attribute
Expose Vapor Request's request-id value, so that it can be passed into logging from other libraries
Allow URLEncodedForms to decode 'on' value als Bool => true
FileMiddleware: Add convenience support for serving files from a Bundle
Prevent vapor streaming requests from randomly losing a first chunk, stalling the request
Fix encoding/decoding an array of dates with URL Encoding
Fix Stream Callback never being called in close
Fix unused generator parameter in Array.random(count:using:)
Prevent vapor from crashing during a crash in third-party code, obfuscating the real problem
Fixing issue #2755: updating config storage inside HTTPServer
Implement support for custom verify callbacks
Add support for regular expression validations
Add documentation comments and a defaulting subscript to `Storage`.
fix: validate each not taking required parameter into account
Fix CredentialsAuthenticator not receiving all the body
Fix handling unicode characters in multipart filenames
Added custom failure descriptions to Validation Errors
Fix ambiguous error with Swift nightlies
Require version of swift-nio-http2 with security fix
Adds default file support to FileMiddleware
Fix empty password in basic authorization parsing
HTTP Authorization header scheme is case-insensitive
Add a new test method to XCTApplicationTester returns a response directly
Add missing public access to HTTPHeaders.Link initializer

Add convenience extensions to HTTPHeader for working with Link headers.
Handle null key correctly in validation when not required
Correctly pass `SocketAddress` through to `Request` convenience initialiser
Fix `comparePreference` function when only one media type specified
Fix issue where Plaintext Decoder would crash
Guard against invalid base32 encoded data
Make thread pool configurable and set default size to 64 threads.
Fix repeated match of switch case
Fix issues with date parsing in HTTP headers
Fix issue when using `:` in HTTP Basic Authentication passwords
Fix building Vapor for tvOS and watchOS
Better error when decoding request with no body
Fix warning when registering HEAD routes for GET requests
Create separate HEAD routes instead of forwarding to GET route handler
Add expiration time to `Cache` protocol and in-memory cache.
Change Vapor's logging levels for errors.
Add option to configure graceful shutdown timeout
Add a way to manually upgrade a request to WebSocket
Add stack trace to `RouteNotFound` error to improve `DebuggableError` conformance
Fix: URLEncodedFormDecoder ignores empty value when decoding Array
Support .jsonAPI media types for decoding content
Avoid a `try!` and an IUO in `XCTVaporTests`
Fix potential race condition when accessing Application.http.client.shared
Fix potential race condition when accessing Application.http.client.shared
Remove duplicated nil checks from DefaultResponder
Rewrite metrics path and method to undefined for unknown routes

Hook up logging to HTTP Client
Extract multipart encoding/decoding from Vapor into MultipartKit

Rework 'SessionData' to be more friendly to 2nd party devs
Permit disabling automatic logging of all requests
Honor Configuration for Optional Date Decoding & Encoding
Reuse the application's event loop group and thread pool when loading .env files

Fix relative percent decoding in FileMiddleware
Default cookie's SameSite attribute to lax
Fix crash related to setting nil hostname and port

Fix array out of bounds error in StackTrace
Add webSocket route overload with array path
Fix misspelled property name of class Routes
Add support for string interpolation to URI
Add validate(query:) method to Validatable protocol
Add non-variadic variants of RoutesBuilder group methods.

Support a closure for instantiating RedirectMiddleware
Follow the 'required' argument for nested validations
Remove percent encoding when logging url path
Add support for PartialRangeUpTo in validators
Refactor request body streaming state handling
Default max body size for streaming request body collection

Improve body handling for HEAD responses
Change async password verifier to non-throwing
Support underscore in HTTP header directive key
HTTP forwarded and contentDisposition + parsing improvements
Use .output close mode for non-keepalive requests

add Storage to Request + Response, deprecate userInfo

set HTTP request decompression ratio limit
